amendment.description: To specify that child care certificates may be included in State strategies to increase the supply of child care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2838 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2838 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2838 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2838 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
